Read the October issue of Investment Executive
 
 

The October issue of Investment Executive is available now in print and online.
 
 
Read the digital edition
 
 
 

Our latest issue urges regulators to defend investor interests while also detailing the new protections bank customers can expect next year. We also speak to Desjardins chief economist Jimmy Jean, this month’s Newsmaker. Don’t miss our Insurance Advisors’ Report Card, with stories on advisor compensation, product freedom and more. Finally, learn how insurance companies have adapted their par portfolios for low rates.
